text: Éric Straumann (born 17 August 1964 in Colmar) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Haut-Rhin department, and was a member of the Union for a Popular Movement, before joining The Republicans. In addition to his committee assignments, Straumann has been a substitute member of the German delegation to the Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe (PACE) since 2020, where he serves on the Committee on Migration, Refugees and Displaced Persons.Éric Straumann Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe.
